text: Ricky Yacobi (born Ricky bin Yacub; 12 March 1963 â€“ 21 November 2020) was an Indonesian football player. He played as a striker. He played for the Indonesian national football team from 1985 to 1990. On 21 November 2020, Yacobi died of a heart attack while playing football at the Gelora Bung Karno Sports Complex in Jakarta, aged 57. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths in sport Category:Indonesian footballers
title: Ricky Yacobi
